name: Religious
victoryScreenHeader:
Gain 50% of your religion followers
in every city of the world!
victoryString: You have achieved victory through the power of faith and conviction. All the nations have submitted to your teachings, for better or worse. Rejoice! For your faith has converted the world.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!
